SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(member_idx),0) AS visit_count, DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS visit_date FROM visitors WHERE visit_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND NOW() GROUP BY visit_date ORDER BY visit_date

SELECT visit_week, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(visit_date, '_', member_idx)), 0) AS visit_count FROM (SELECT WEEK(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL n WEEK)) AS visit_week FROM (SELECT 0 AS n UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6) AS numbers WHERE WEEK(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL n WEEK)) IS NOT NULL -- Exclude NULL values ) AS weeks LEFT JOIN visitors ON visit_week = WEEK(visit_date) AND visit_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY visit_week ORDER BY visit_week
